longDescription: Bella is a 2-year-old Labrador Retriever who loves to play and is great with kids. She is vaccinated and spayed. Looking for a loving home where she can get plenty of exercise and attention.

Max is a 3-year-old domestic shorthair cat. He is very calm and loves to cuddle. He is litter trained and vaccinated. Max would be a perfect companion for someone looking for a relaxed and loving pet.

Charlie is a 1-year-old rabbit who loves to explore and hop around. He is very energetic and curious about his surroundings. Charlie is looking for a home where he can get plenty of space to roam and fresh vegetables to munch on.

Luna is a 5-year-old German Shepherd who is very loyal and protective. She is well-trained and loves to play fetch. Luna is looking for a home with a yard where she can get plenty of exercise and be a part of the family.
